Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Account_Current, Account_Junior, Account_Saver
    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic information of an account:
    - accID
    - type
    - PIN
    - balance
    - overdraftLimit
    - clearing
    - accountStatus
    - noticed
    Details of all accounts are in file "BankSystem/src/File/Accounts.txt"
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Xi Xia

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Account.AccountStatus
      Define 3 status of accounts
      static class  Account.Type
      Define 3 types of accounts

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int accID  
      protected double balance  
      protected double clearing
      0 for cleared, record the amount when not cleared
      protected boolean noticed
      true for noticed before withdrawal, false for not noticed
      protected double overdraftLimit
      0 for Junior and Saver accounts,
      else, record the overdraftLimit of current accounts
      protected java.lang.String PIN  
      protected Account.AccountStatus status
      default status is "SUSPENDED", other status are "ACTIVE", "CLOSED"
      protected Account.Type type

      Account()

      • openAccount

        public void openAccount​(java.lang.String birth)
        Function1. Open Account
        - make the account activated
        - write all information into files
        Parameters:
        birth - use the birthday as default PIN
        See Also:
        getAccIDForNewAcc(), writeAccFinder(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int), writeAcc()

                            double amount,
                            java.lang.String clearMode)
        Deposit Funds
        Parameters:
        providedAccID - account ID from the customer's input
        amount - depositing amount from the customer's input
        clearMode - clearing mode from the customer's input
        Returns:
        whether the operation is successful
        See Also:
        isAccActive(String)

      • accIDnPINVerify

        public boolean accIDnPINVerify​(java.lang.String providedAccID,
                               java.lang.String providedPIN)
        Verify the accID and PIN when
        - withdrawing funds
        - clearing funds
        - suspending account
        - closing account
        Parameters:
        providedAccID - account ID from the customer's input
        providedPIN - Pin from the customer's input
        Returns:
        whether the provided PIN is correct for the provided account
